schema:creator: Jorjorian-Miller, Sylvia
schema:description:
__Artist's Statement:__ I used a drawing app called ibisPaint X to do this art. The art depicts a girl sitting outside with her dog while listening to music. I personally love sitting with my dog with music playing in my ears and this is how my quarantine has been for a few months.  
 __Participant age:__ 12  
 __Category:__  Kids Age 12-14 (drawings/paintings only)
schema:name: Quarantine Tranquility
schema:publisher: UC Davis Library, Archives and Special Collections
schema:sdPublisher: UC Davis, Archives and Special Collections
